name: Yandere Escape
description:
Description:
Yandere Escape is a: (indie, RPG, casual, horror) game where you have to escape from an unknown facility, where your kidnapper took you.
To escape from the facility, you have to go through doors that take you to 20 different rooms to work your way to the exit. But be careful! You are not always alone!
The enemy is an insane psychopath who thinks you are her property and doesn't want to let you go. But if you don't want to mold in this hole, you have to take the next best opportunity to find the exit without getting caught by her.

Basic story:
You play an adult man who works professionally in an office as an accountant and otherwise lives alone at home. Today you met for a few beers with your best buddies in the pub after the long day, that you had together ...

Current story:
"I was just having a beer with my best friends from the work and now I'm here ...
My head hurts, I have no idea where I am and who is this scary girl who are staring at me all the time !?"

The main target:
Find a way out and try not to be caught by the Yandere.
